about_the_game:
A Puzzle played on a chess board with 4 sides chits that Rotate and effect enemy chits when sides clash. you move your chits one square at a time trying to capture enemy crown chits. you play against a Random number pf turns.

On the chits you may have a sword for attacking, a shield for defence or blank. when edges make contact the chits may rotate if shields clash or be captured if a sword does not contact a shield. the strategy can be very hard to predict , move your chits in a way so that you get a sword to contact a crowns undefended side. capture all 4 crowns to win the board. the A.I. will try and stop you by moving its own chits but the clock is always against you in a turn based timer.

after you have played some games you can see your results of all games played.

It's a casual puzzle, simple to learn but will test your skill.
